Programs

Home Programs

Commercial driver training

Actively Recruiting Accommodates Multiple Languages

Red Hook on the Road

Through this program students prepare to work as commercial drivers. For Unemployed New Yorkers and Adults.

  • Job training,  job certification
  • Transportation
  • 4 weeks,  night class schedule
Learn more about Commercial driver training

HSE and job prep for youth

Actively Recruiting Accommodates Multiple Languages

Advance & Earn

Create a plan to achieve career and educational goals. For Unemployed New Yorkers and Youth (16–24).

  • Academic help,  paid work,  skill building
  • 6 months,  full-time schedule
Learn more about HSE and job prep for youth

Web development training

Actively Recruiting Accommodates Multiple Languages

Web Development Fellowship at Fullstack Academy

This program takes students from amateur to professional in 24 weeks. For Unemployed New Yorkers, Adults, and Low-income.

  • Job training,  job prep
  • Technology
  • 6 months,  full time schedule
Learn more about Web development training

Home health aide training

Accommodates Multiple Languages

SBS Home Health Aide Training

Prepare for a job in the healthcare field. For Adults.

  • Job training,  job certification
  • Health care
  • 100 hours,  flexible schedule
Learn more about Home health aide training

Math and reading for HSE Prep

Accommodates Multiple Languages

NYC DOE Basic Education Classes

For Adults and Immigrant New Yorkers.

  • Adult education,  HSE prep
  • 3 months,  varied schedule
Learn more about Math and reading for HSE Prep

Classes to improve English skills

Accommodates Multiple Languages

English for Speakers of Other Languages

English language learners in the Flatbush/East Flatbush communities get help with language and math skills. For Immigrants and Young Adults (16 - 24).

  • Improving English skills
  • 3 months,  daytime, or  part-time
Learn more about Classes to improve English skills

Career-focused English learning

Accommodates Multiple Languages

NYPL English for Work Classes

Intermediate and Advanced speakers can improve English skills aimed at finding a new job or career. For Immigrants and Adults (18+).

  • Improving English skills,  help finding work
  • Less than 3 months,  evenings,  weekends, or  part-time
Learn more about Career-focused English learning

Bilingual commercial driver training

Accommodates Multiple Languages

Sunset Park Bridge to Commercial Driving

This program includes classes to improve English skills followed by training to become a commercial driver. For Immigrants and Adults (18+).

  • Training for a new career,  improving English skills
  • Less than 3 months,  full-time
Learn more about Bilingual commercial driver training
